sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description/>
        <name>Upgrade Script-August (sdc Dictionary)</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var docArr = [{
        'query': 'elementISEMPTY^name=sn_spend_sdc_service_request',
        'attribute': {
            'label': 'Service Case',
            'plural': 'Service Cases'
        }
    },
    {
        'query': 'elementISEMPTY^name=sn_spend_sdc_service_request_line',
        'attribute': {
            'label': 'Service Case Line',
            'plural': 'Service Case Lines'
        }
    },
    {
        'query': 'element=purchase_request^name=sn_spend_sdc_service_request',
        'attribute': {
            'label': 'Purchase requisition',
            'plural': 'Purchase requisitions'
        }
    },
    {
        'query': 'element=service_request^name=sn_spend_sdc_service_task',
        'attribute': {
            'label': 'Case',
            'plural': 'Cases',
            'hint': 'Service case associated to this task'
        }
    },
    {
        'query': 'element=service_request_line^name=sn_spend_sdc_service_task',
        'attribute': {
            'label': 'Service case line',
            'plural': 'Service case lines',
            'hint': 'Service case line associated to the service task'
        }
    }
];

var dictionaryArr = [{
        'query': 'element=revision_type^name=sn_spend_sdc_service_request',
        'attribute': {
            'label': 'Related process',
            'default_value': ''
        }
    },
    {
        'query': 'element=request_type^name=sn_spend_sdc_service_request',
        'attribute': {
            'label': 'Case type',
        }
    }
];

var choiceArr = [{
        'query': 'element=state^name=sn_spend_sdc_service_request^value=20',
        'attribute': {
            'label': 'In review',
        }
    },
    {
        'query': 'element=state^name=sn_spend_sdc_service_request^value=30',
        'attribute': {
            'label': 'Work in progress',
        }
    },
    {
        'query': 'element=revision_type^name=sn_spend_sdc_service_request^value=edit_pr',
        'attribute': {
            'label': 'Edit purchase requisition'
        }
    },
    {
        'query': 'element=revision_type^name=sn_spend_sdc_service_request^value=cancel_pr',
        'attribute': {
            'label': 'Cancel purchase requisition'
        }
    },
];

// Update Dictionary Elements
dictionaryArr.forEach(updateDictionary);
// Update Choices in Dictionary
choiceArr.forEach(updateChoice);

docArr.forEach(updateDocumentation);

function updateDocumentation(docObj) {
    var documenationGr = new GlideRecord('sys_documentation');
    documenationGr.addEncodedQuery(docObj.query);
    documenationGr.query();
    while (documenationGr.next())
        new global.PTGlobalAPI().updateDictionary(documenationGr, docObj.attribute);
}

function updateDictionary(obj) {
    var dictionaryGr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
    dictionaryGr.addEncodedQuery(obj.query);
    dictionaryGr.query();
    while (dictionaryGr.next())
        new global.PTGlobalAPI().updateDictionary(dictionaryGr, obj.attribute);
}

function updateChoice(obj) {
    var choiceGr = new GlideRecord('sys_choice');
    choiceGr.addEncodedQuery(obj.query);
    choiceGr.query();
    while (choiceGr.next())
        new global.PTGlobalAPI().updateDictionary(choiceGr, obj.attribute);
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-06-11 04:50:47</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>3c126227c3203010b12ad0f73c40dd11</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Upgrade Script-August (sdc Dictionary)</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="">d8a34403534f101077b6ddeeff7b12a5</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="">d8a34403534f101077b6ddeeff7b12a5</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_3c126227c3203010b12ad0f73c40dd11</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2021-07-19 04:29:39</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
